content.rendered:
I have known Tom Johnson for over 30 years.  First meeting him at a Pierce Brothers location when we were touring Cremation Societies and funeral homes in California in the early 80’s.  Over the years we have kept in touch with Tom and Jake at various meetings and conventions.

So when it came time to sell our business we looked to Johnson Consulting.  Not only to find a buyer for business, but to fine a buyer who would fit into the future needs of our business.  We were looking for someone who would let us continue on with the growth of our business, and keep our family and employees involved.

As a third generation business, we had learned what it took to build our business.  However we needed help in transitioning it to new ownership.   Johnson Consulting did a great job gathering all the data to show potential buyers about our company.  The work that Karen McCurdy and the staff at Johnson Consulting Group did to assist us was very appreciated.   We could have not done it without them.
